elements.title: Make a note of what ways of escaping from everyday life you know yourself or have observed in others.
elements.correctAnswer: Addiction (alcohol, tobacco, cannabis, medication, hard drugs, ...), shopping, activism, going out, work (workaholic)

elements.name: question2
elements.title: There are various signs that should make it clear to the father that his reliving addiction has reached an alarming level. List at least five signs in keywords.
elements.correctAnswer: Bad conscience, unpunctuality at work, threat of dismissal from employer, daughter's reactions, pelvis for urination, loss of reality, living in the past, neglect of daughter, loss of control, failure with own intentions, ...
